participant_1.background:
Chocolate is my favorite food.
I am learning how to play the piano.
I am the youngest sibling of four.
I geocache in my spare time.
I am a school psychologist.

participant_2.background:
I start my senior year of high school next week.
My favorite sport is hockey.
I went to japan this summer.
My best friend just moved away.
My mom is a painter.

content.text: Not much, just getting ready for my senior year of high school.
That's exciting! What are you most looking forward to?
I'm excited to be able to take more electives, and I'm also excited to start playing hockey again.
That's awesome! I used to play hockey when I was in high school. It's a lot of fun.
Yeah, it is. I went to Japan this summer and got to play hockey with some of the locals. It was a lot of fun.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to go to Japan.
You should! It's a beautiful country.
I know, it's definitely on my list of places to visit.
What are you doing for your senior year?
I'm going to be a school psychologist.
Oh, that's cool! What made you decide to do that?
I've always been interested in helping people, and I think that being a school psychologist is a great way to do that.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll be a great psychologist.
Thanks! I'm excited to get started.
